data.subTitle: stringify传函数
data.content:
'use strict';

var xiaoming = {
    name: '小明',
    age: 14,
    gender: true,
    height: 1.65,
    grade: null,
    'middle-school': '\"W3C\" Middle School',
    skills: ['JavaScript', 'Java', 'Python', 'Lisp']
};
function convert(key,value){
    if (typeof value === 'string'){
        return value.toUpperCase();
    }
    return value;
}
var s = JSON.stringify(xiaoming,convert,' ');
console.log(s)

输出结果(上面的代码把所有属性值都变成大写)：

{
  "name": "小明",
  "age": 14,
  "gender": true,
  "height": 1.65,
  "grade": null,
  "middle-school": "\"W3C\" MIDDLE SCHOOL",
  "skills": [
    "JAVASCRIPT",
    "JAVA",
    "PYTHON",
    "LISP"
  ]
}
